events.name: Android Code Club(Taipei)

venue.name: 天瓏書局
venue.address_1: 台北市中正區重慶南路一段105號

events.description:
每週三舉辦 19:00-22:00

讓Android 開發者在每週三有個可以討論的地方

到了可以詢問櫃台：Android 聚會

場地低消：低消飲料 150 用餐 250

1.如果你是新手那麼你可以把你的問題帶過來跟與會的朋友討論（問題最好切成各個小問題，太大的問題3個小時的聚會時間沒有辦法解決）

2.如果你是熟手那麼你可以跟高手討教關於架構的問題或是記憶體管理的問題，新東西等等，也可以幫助在場的新手朋友們。

3.如果你是高手那麼你可以到場提升大家的能力，找尋合作夥伴，炫技等等。

如果你只是想過來聊聊也很歡迎！

可以到場coding、聊天、把工作帶過來做。

events.name: INQUIZITION (Pub Quiz)

venue.name: Redpoint Brewing Co Taproom
venue.address_1: 復興南路二段132號, Taipei, Taiwan 132

events.description:
Please arrive 15-20 minutes prior to starting time to get your team together and find seats.

Definition:
Pub Quiz - a place to show off your knowledge and make everyone jealous of your large brain.
定義：
Pub Quiz - 一個地方你可以表現你比你多朋友聰明。

The brain of the average sperm whale weighs in at about 12 kilograms while the average human brain comes in at about 1.2 kilograms. That's ten times as much grey matter!
鯨魚的腦袋稱12公斤但人類的只有1.2公斤。那是10倍!

But when was the last time you saw a sperm whale write a book,start a travel blog, explode itself into space, or make fun of other, uglier animals?
你上一次看到鯨魚寫一本書，飛到外太空，或嘲笑比牠醜陋的動物是什麼時候？

That just goes to show, it's not the size that matters, it's how you use it! So, how good are you at using that pineapple sized lump of goo up there? Are you a grey matter master, or are you just lucky we happened to evolve with thumbs?
重點是不是大小才重要!是用法!所以你用你的腦袋多好呢？你是是天才或是只是運氣好的人？

Come slam that squiggly, dream meat of yours up against the best and brightest in the first ever: Top Shelf Games Pub Quiz at the fabulous Redpoint Brewing Co Taproom!
來測試一下自己的腦袋跟別的很厲害的人在Top Shelf Games的pub quiz Pk!

Limit: 3-4 brains per team and a total of only 8 teams. Winning team gets a free pitcher on the house and an awesome trophy.
限制： 我們會限制8個隊。每一隊要3-4個人。贏的隊會得到很棒的獎盃+免費的啤酒.

100nt entry fee (not including a drink)
Minimum: 1 drink per person
門票： 100/人 (不包含酒)
抵銷： 1杯飲料

Message the Top Shelf Games Co or Redpoint page to pre-register to make sure you and your team can nab a table before they're gone!
報名方式： 請聯絡Redpoint Brewing Co Taproom或Top Shelf Games Co到你報名!

*****Disclaimer*****

When attending this event organizers reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason and to take and use photos for an unlimited period of time. No one may use the photos taken by Top Shelf Games Co for any business related reasons. Only organizers have the right to cancel or adjust this event in any way.

主辦單位保有隨時修改及終止本活動之權利。於所辦任何活動上所拍攝之照片均有權永久使用於主辦單位之所有活動頁面及網

events.name: TWJUG 201909 聚會
events.description:
網站: http://www.twjug.org
FB社群: https://www.facebook.com/groups/185338705012/

贊助單位:
* 感謝 LINE 贊助本次活動的場地和食物！
* 感謝 JetBrains 贊助個人版授權一年份 x 1！

活動內容：

一、

主題: ZGC for Future LINE HBase

講者: Shinya Yoshida

Shinya Yoshida is a Serverside Engineer for LINE. He is working for Dev/Ops of HBase clusters for LINE Messaging Service. He was contributed to OpenJDK Projects like Lambda and Kulla, and is now a committer of OpenJDK and a board member of JJUG(Japan JUG).

簡介:

LINE Messaging service uses HBase as a persistent store, which is running on JVM. GC pause affects HBase response time and the service finally. We're using G1GC for our HBase, but we still have many 100+ ms pauses. And GC pause time will be a bottleneck of increasing JVM heap size to get the full-power of HBase because if we increase the heap size, the pause time is getting more longer.

At Java 11, they introduced extremely low pause time GC as an experimental feature, ZGC. We considered ZGC will free us from HBase GC pause issues and evaluated it with HBase in our test cluster.

I show the basis of GC and which part is different from other GCs and ZGC. I also share the points to choose GC and why we considered ZGC fits our HBase. And I show the evaluation results of ZGC with HBase. I also talk future plan to apply ZGC to our production environment.

二、

主題: Kafka Broker performance degradation by mysterious JVM pause

講者: Yuto Kawamura

Yuto Kawamura is a Senior Software Engineer at LINE.

He's leading a team providing company-wide Kafka platform and working for a lot of reliability/performance engineerings.
He's an Apache Kafka contributor, also he gave a lot of presentations in large conferences such as Kafka Summit 2017/2018, LINE DEVELOPER DAY 2018 and he loves visiting 九份.

簡介:

At LINE we are operating one of the largest scale Kafka cluster operated as a middleware infra for many services. Since it receives large scale traffic such that over 260 billion messages / day, we often meet a performance issue and try to deal with it. Recently we had an interesting case which makes Kafka broker to lowly perform due to insanely long JVM pause which wasn't caused by GC nor other typical causes. In this talk I'm gonna talk how did we investigated this issue diving beyond into the Linux kernel and finally solved it.

注意事項：

• 活動只需要在這邊或是 kktix.com 其中一邊報名就好，請勿兩邊報名喔 :)

events.name: FitFam Taipei - Mon 7:00pm DaAn Park playground

group.name: FitFam Taipei - HIIT, Outdoor, Climbing, OCR Training

events.description:
We will focus on HIIT (high-intensity interval training) training geared toward Spartan race and overall fitness. We will do circuit training with pull-ups, lunges, crawls, running and ... many more. All workouts are designed to be accessible and adaptable to all levels. No equipment or previous experience is required.

All you got to do is take the first step and want to be better than the person you were yesterday.

More information on Spartan race is below:
https://kwankwan.kktix.cc/events/spartanracenewtptc

Two upcoming races for the Spartan race:
1. Stadion (Taichung, Sept 21) -- Introductory 5k race
2. Trifecta Challenge (Gongliao, New Taipei City, Oct. 19/20) -- Beast(21km)/Super(13km)/Sprint(6km) race. You can do one, two or all three in the same weekend!

Please join our LINE group for events/race details/friends and inquire about FitFam group race discount.

Line: http://line.me/ti/g/KwSYJ1F6Vx
Phone (0)[masked]
events.how_to_find_us: Go to north east side of park, between playground and gym

events.name: Great Stairs Challenge - Chiang Kai Shek Memorial Hall

group.name: FitFam Taipei - HIIT, Outdoor, Climbing, OCR Training

events.description:
Goal: Build those perfect legs for running
Meeting location: In front of the main stairs of
Chiang Kai Shek Memorial Hall

Program:
-Warm up run around the square
-Stretching and warm up exercises
-Stairs challenge for 2 different levels
-Stretching

Total Duration: 1hr - 1hr30min

PS: Try not to eat 2hr before attending as there will be jumping involved. Also to bring water.

events.name: Taipei Free Walking Tour / Historic
events.description:
Imagine this: gaining a basic yet thorough understanding of Taiwanese history and culture just within one walk - sounds interesting, doesn't it?

The West end of Taipei was once the center of political and economic activities of the city and where modern development started. This tour covers all the essential attractions in West Taipei as well as the stories and legends behind them. Walking from the past to the present, you will see how Taipei is shaped by multiple cultures and historic events and get a clear picture of this amazing city.

Just come to join us, meet some local friends, learn more about Taipei, and enjoy a chill morning together!

► Check out more details: http://www.likeitformosa.com/historic
***
▪️ WHEN: Every day 10:00am - 01:00pm
▪️ WHERE: Meet up @ Exit 1, MRT Longshan Temple Station (Please go upstairs to the ground floor)
▪️ HOW: Click 'Going' and simply show up on time

events.name: Taipei Free Walking Tour / Golden Age
events.description:
Are you a fan of the glamorous roaring twenties? Here's the chance to experience the oriental version of the 1920s in Taipei!

The roaring twenties, a colorful period in which the cultural heroes of each country shined. As Pablo Picasso is to Spain, Ernest Hemingway is to the U.S., Coco Chanel is to France, so is everything that prospered around Taipei North Gate and Dadaocheng to Taiwan.

This Golden Age Tour walks you through places where once Taiwan’s literati and artists gathered, and gives you a peek of how Dadaocheng has transformed over the years into a creative hub where traditions clash with innovations.

Just come to join us, meet some local friends, learn more about Taipei, and enjoy a chill afternoon together!

► Check out more details: http://www.likeitformosa.com/goldenage
***
▪️ WHEN: Every day 03:00pm - 05:30pm
▪️ WHERE: Meet up @ Exit 2, MRT Beimen Station (Please go upstairs to the ground floor)
▪️ HOW: Click 'Join Event' and simply show up on time

events.name: Beiping Roast Duck Restaurant 真北平烤鴨
events.description:
Hey everyone! This Sunday, we will try one of the most delicious dishes in Taiwan.
This time, we will try Beiping Roast Duck, and we will teach you the proper way to eat the dishes and more!

We will teach you survival Chinese for food, too.(Take this course and, in just 30-50 mins, get PRACTICAL Mandarin Chinese to help you survive in Taiwan.)

Event Fees:
100NT per individual event.(It doesn't include the meal fee).
First comers get a 50% discount making it 50NT
Please pay your fees before the class, thanks.

We will meet at Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall station exit 3 and walk from there.
Address: No. 1 Ningbo East Street, Zhongzheng District

See you there!
